channel.title: A little help
channel.description:
Ok, so i didnt want to download a 503/508 client made by someone else (other than a basic one) so i got a simple client with an IP changer. Whenever i try to run, it allows me to, comes up to the login screen... I then type my user & pass and i get a white screen, with this error in the .bat
[code]Error: T3 - true,0,104,1401869149,-48544502,-1125057849,-1186152368 | RSString:8 55 Class21:188 Class21:520 Class61:337 client:767 Applet_Sub1:485 Applet_Sub1:15 6 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.RuntimeException error_game_crash Shutdown complete - clean:true [/code]
If anyone could explain how i would go about fixing this, please post here.
On another note, if anyone has a link to a 'blank' 503/508 client which i can use & edit myself, please post it here.

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @Project_Rune_Resurre Project Rune Resurrection
item.description:
@Project_Rune_Resurre wrote:

Yes, im able to connect to other servers using their clients and as i said above, my client will load, but i get the white-screen error when i click ‘log-in’.

Read full topic

item.title: A little help
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Have you downloaded and added the cache correctly?

Read full topic
